FKE Seminar Series – Assoc. Prof. Ir. Ts. Dr. Tan Chee Wei
==========================================================

by [postgraduatepic](https://fke.utm.my/author/postgraduatepic/ "Posts by postgraduatepic")
 | May 23, 2024 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [FKESeminarSeries](https://fke.utm.my/category/fkeseminarseries/)
, [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/publicationseminar_stretched.jpeg-960x675.png)

With great pleasure, we cordially invite all academic staff members and postgraduate students to join the following publication seminar:  
Title: How to Write Good Review Papers in Electrical and Electronics Journals  
Date: 12 June 2024 (Wednesday)  
Time: 2.30-4.30 pm  
Venue: Smart Classroom, Level 5, P19a, Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, Johor Bahru  
Speaker: Assoc. Prof. Ir. Ts. Dr. Tan Chee Wei  
Registration: [LINK](https://bit.ly/4brJBNm)

CPD hours are awarded for staff (subject to approval)  and PG students’ attendance is counted to fulfill the faculty’s requirement.

Thank you.
